validation.message: Principal amount must be greater than 0
Interest rate must be between 0% and 100%
Time period must be greater than 0

seo.metaDescription: Calculate simple interest on loans and investments. Free online calculator with flexible time units (years, months, weeks, days).

howItWorks.title: How Simple Interest Works
howItWorks.description: Simple interest is calculated using the formula: Interest = Principal × Rate × Time. Unlike compound interest, simple interest doesn't earn interest on previously accumulated interest.

variables.name: Interest
variables.description: The amount of interest earned or paid

variables.name: Rate
variables.description: The annual interest rate (as a decimal)

tips: Simple interest is linear - it grows at a constant rate over time
Most modern loans use compound interest, not simple interest
Simple interest is easier to calculate manually than compound interest
The time period affects the total interest more than small changes in rate
